description: Add new tags to a contact.
name: contact_tag_add

api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

email.description: Contact email address to associate the tags with (use this OR id parameter).

id.description: Contact ID to associate the tags with (use this OR email parameter).

tags.description: Tags to add to the contact. Pass a string (for one tag) or an array (for multiple tags).
